sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row 
      align="center"
      justify="center"
      no-gutters>
      <v-row 
        align="center"
        justify="center"
        no-gutters>
        {{sliderValue}}
      </v-row>
      <v-row 
        align="center"
        justify="center"
        no-gutters>
        <v-slider
          v-model="sliderValue"
          thumb-color="primary"
          thumb-label="always"
        ></v-slider>
      </v-row>
      <v-row 
        align="center"
        justify="center"
        no-gutters>
        {{buttonValue}}
      </v-row>
      <v-row 
      align="center"
      justify="center"
      no-gutters>
        <v-col>
          <v-btn class="success" @click="onIncreaseButtonPress()">
            Increase
          </v-btn>
        </v-col>
        <v-col>
          <v-btn class="error" @click="onDecreaseButtonPress()" >
            Decrease
          </v-btn>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    name: 'AnimationComponent',
    data() {
      return {
        buttonValue: 0,
        sliderValue: 0,
      }
    },
    computed: {},
    mounted() {},
    methods: {
      onIncreaseButtonPress(){
        this.buttonValue += 1
      },
      onDecreaseButtonPress(){
        this.buttonValue -= 1
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style>

</style>
